remarks: Restricted quantifier version of Axiom 5 of [Mendelson] p. 69.  This is the axiom ~ stdpc5 of standard predicate calculus for a restricted domain.  See ~ ra4v for a version requiring fewer axioms.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Jan-2004.)  (Proof shortened by BJ, 27-Mar-2020.)
statement:
ra4.1 $e |- F/ x ph $.
ra4 $p |- ( A. x e. A ( ph -> ps ) -> ( ph -> A. x e. A ps ) ) $.
